column5: I used large size and I'm 5'9 also I am heavier than u 200lbs riverfisher.. so its should fit you perfectly..
Welcome ,,,,,,,,sweet fish,

Long time lurker, finally got around to registering..  Here's a pike I caught last week at a small local lake. Caught it on an Ultra Light Rod + tear drop jig head w/ chartreuse gulp alive fish fry... 4lb fireline ice  Long
Nice fish welcomee aboard.
Welcome to our board Long...Nice fish you caught there
Welcome Long.  I'll bet you there are more where that one came from.
welcome aboard
Must have been a great fight with 4 lbs test!!  Welcome, can't wait to see what other tricks you have up your sleeve.
Nice fish Long and welcome to the board.   Art
Nice shootin Long!...welcome aboard...
Great fish Long!!!   Welcome to the board
welcome to the board Mr. Long. Nice young gator ya got. Looking forward to future pics. Thanks for sharing.
welcome
Welcome aboard Mr. Long, nice pike. Reminds me of some of the local area (Hamilton) pike we get here in the winter.
*SMILES*
Welcome! Pictures are always nice! Nice fat looking Pike!  Where abouts is "Local"? You don't have to be specific, just wondering what region this is in.
it's around the Ballantree area... the fish was released immediately after the photo...
Welcome aboard.  Must have been a fun fight. Keep the pics coming!
Nice way to introduce yourself Welcome Aboard SBK
welcome aboard..... nice fish too eh..
Cool! Thanks
welcome aboard... u will enjoy here, everyones willing to help and shared knowledges.. nice pike by the way...
Welcome to OFC buddy, great forum and please post fishing reports with pics often!  MTBF
Nice job man!!  I notice you have the mustang ms-195 atlantic class float suit. What size is it? I''m 6 ft 180 lbs and wonder if a large would fit, thanks.
Nice pike Long, great intro. Welcome aboard

I have the medium... I'm around 5'9 155lb... I think a large should fit you perfectly...  Someone told me that the float suit should be purchased according to your weight as it's supposed to keep you buoyant... so if you are 5ft and you weigh 180lb, technically you still need a large..  I got mine @ LeBaron when they have the 10% off w/ no tax sale.. ended up costing around $325 all in or sth like that
Sweet, thanks for your input Long.
